attributes.title: 2012 Toyota Aygo 1.0 Wild 5-dr

attributes.description:
What an awesome entry-level car for the young at heart, and for a 1-litre car, it sure can move.
This car is ideal for city traffic and it's compact, funky and sporty.
 Fuel consumption is rather efficient, and consumes about 19km/ litre with 5.5 litres/100kms.
Inside, the Yaris Liftback's dashboard differs notably from that of the sedan. Three gloveboxes (yes, three) and a narrow center stack make the instrument panel unique to the hatchback. One of the hatchback's most practical interior features is the sliding and reclining rear seats for more space.
Fuel-efficient, comfortable ride quality, crisp handling sums up the Yaris.

Finance available and
Trade ins welcome.
